channel.title: 2006Remade!
channel.description:
[b][font=georgia]Updates:[/font][/b] Smithing done. zombie random added. sailing added. New combat system. Music tab working & unlocking songs added along with 98% F2P areas with music playing! New developer to the team! ( Mod Flavius ) Private testing has started! ( alpha out soon! So make sure to keep updated / sign up on forums! ) Rune Mysteries Quest completed
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img][b]Combat[/b] *Pvp fully complete *PvN fully complete *Equipment requirements
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img][b]Magic[/b] *Every modern spell *Every ancient spell *Alching
[img]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img][b]Range[/b] *Bows&arrows *Can't shoot through walls
[img]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img][b]Prayer[/b] *All bones bury-able *Every prayer working properly
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img][b]Mining[/b] *Emptying and refilling rocks *Prospecting *All ores can be mined *Random chance of obtaining gems
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img][b]Smithing[/b] *All bars can be made *All bars can be made into items
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img][b]Fishing[/b] *All fish can be caught *Correct item requirements *Moving fishing locations
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img][b]Cooking[/b] *Meats *Flour collecting *Bread *Pies *Stews *Pizzas *Cakes *Wine *Potatoes *Diary
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img][b]Woodcutting[/b] *All trees cut-able *Stumps and regrowing trees
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img][b]Firemaking[/b] *All logs light able *Clipped
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img][b]Crafting[/b] *Leather crafting *Full tanning *Pottery (fired and unfired items) *Gem cutting *Jewellry making
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img][b]Runecrafting[/b] *All altars working *Correct multiple crafting *Talismans "pull" to altars
[img]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img][b]Music and Sounds[/b] *Music on region of player *Unlocking songs & working music tab *All skilling sounds *Various attacking sounds
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img][b]Quests[/b] *Cook's Assistant *Witch's Potion *Doric's Quest *Rune Mysteries Quest *Tutorial Island ( Wouldn't say we started it, but we have a base made. )
[b]Media: ( Will add more soon )[/b]
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/35bbcax.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2co4k7t.png[/img]
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2co4k7t.png[/img]
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/f6jvo.png[/img]
[img]http://i50.tinypic.com/mr7b68.png[/img]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x_oCSAJZnTY[/youtube]
Source: *
Client: *
this was re uload for people who didn't get a chance to get the source and client so yeh all the credits goes to Mod TOM , Mod flavius and the other development team!
give me some reps++

item.title: 2006Remade!
item.dc:creator: @ranqedrs ranqedrs
item.description:
@ranqedrs wrote:

[font=georgia]Updates:[/font]
Smithing done.
zombie random added.
sailing added.
New combat system.
Music tab working & unlocking songs added along with 98% F2P areas with music playing!
New developer to the team! ( Mod Flavius )
Private testing has started! ( alpha out soon! So make sure to keep updated / sign up on forums! )
Rune Mysteries Quest completed

Combat
*Pvp fully complete
*PvN fully complete
*Equipment requirements

Magic
*Every modern spell
*Every ancient spell
*Alching

Range
*Bows&arrows
*Can’t shoot through walls

Prayer
*All bones bury-able
*Every prayer working properly

Mining
*Emptying and refilling rocks
*Prospecting
*All ores can be mined
*Random chance of obtaining gems

Smithing
*All bars can be made
*All bars can be made into items

Fishing
*All fish can be caught
*Correct item requirements
*Moving fishing locations

Cooking
*Meats
*Flour collecting
*Bread
*Pies
*Stews
*Pizzas
*Cakes
*Wine
*Potatoes
*Diary

Woodcutting
*All trees cut-able
*Stumps and regrowing trees

Firemaking
*All logs light able
*Clipped

Crafting
*Leather crafting
*Full tanning
*Pottery (fired and unfired items)
*Gem cutting
*Jewellry making

Runecrafting
*All altars working
*Correct multiple crafting
*Talismans “pull” to altars

Music and Sounds
*Music on region of player
*Unlocking songs & working music tab
*All skilling sounds
*Various attacking sounds

Quests
*Cook’s Assistant
*Witch’s Potion
*Doric’s Quest
*Rune Mysteries Quest
*Tutorial Island ( Wouldn’t say we started it, but we have a base made. )

Media: ( Will add more soon )
